description: Try our easy to follow Pork Shoulder Roasted With Sage & Cider recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork Shoulder Roasted With Sage & Cider
name: Pork Shoulder Roasted With Sage & Cider Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pork from the pan and rest for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, drain the cooking juices from the pan into a jug and keep warm. Remove the string from the pork and slice. Serve with pears, onion, roasted carrots and reserved pan juices.
